biotools.summary: VirHunter is a deep learning method that uses Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) and a Random Forest Classifier to identify viruses in sequencing datasets. More precisely, VirHunter classifies previously assembled contigs as viral, host, and bacterial (contamination).

galaxy.summary: Deep Learning method for novel virus detection in sequencing data
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: VirHunter is a deep learning method that uses Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) and a Random Forest Classifier to identify viruses in sequencing datasets. More precisely, VirHunter classifies previously assembled contigs as viral, host, and bacterial (contamination).
